changeSet.author: baskaran radhakrishnan
changeSet.sql: update TBL_KEY_REFER set KEYWORD3 = 'FOLKS' WHERE keyword1 = 'EMPLOYEES' AND keyword2 = 'RESOURCES'
update TBL_KEY_REFER set KEYWORD3 = 'RISK ITEMS', KEYWORD4 = 'RISKITEMS' where KEYWORD1 = 'RISKS' AND KEYWORD2='RISK ITEM'

changeSet.author: baskaran radhakrishnan
changeSet.sql: update tbl_key_refer set fieldname = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MM-RRRR'') DOJ' where fieldname = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MM-RRRR'')'

update tbl_key_refer set fieldname = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOL,''DD-MM-RRRR'') DOL' where fieldname = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOL,''DD-MM-RRRR'')'

update tbl_key_refer set fieldname = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_EMAIL,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MM-RRRR'') DOJ' where fieldname = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_EMAIL,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MM-RRRR'')'

update tbl_key_refer set wheretcond = 'SD_MONTH_YEAR' , wherecond=' = = to_char(sysdate,''MMYYYY'')',dynaword1= 'THIS MONTH',dynaword2='CURRENT MONTH' where KEYWORD1='SCHEDULED DEVIATION' AND KEYWORD2='SCHEDULEDDEVIATION' AND KEYWORD3 = 'DEVIATION'
update tbl_key_refer set KEYWORD3 ='' where KEYWORD1='SCHEDULED DEVIATION' AND KEYWORD2='SCHEDULEDDEVIATION' AND KEYWORD3 = 'DEVIATION'

changeSet.author: baskaran radhakrishnan
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBL_KEY_REFER SET FIELDNAME = 'EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_PROJECT,EMP_ROLE,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MM-RRRR'') DOJ,EMP_CTC_PM' WHERE KEYWORD1='CTC' AND KEYWORD2='SALARY'
UPDATE TBL_KEY_REFER SET WHERECOND = ' = to_char(sysdate,''MMYYYY'')' WHERE WHERECOND=' = = to_char(sysdate,''MMYYYY'')'

changeSet.author: baskaran radhakrishnan
changeSet.sql: update tbl_key_refer set fieldname='TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MM-RRRR'') DOJ' where keyword1='DATE JOINING'
